name: Thrifty Witch
description: "A dusty pearl is still a pearl."

name: Phantom in Pursuit
description: "Not all phantoms stay hidden in the shadow."

name: Finalized Plan
description: "When you follow a plan, at least you'll always know what causes your failure."

name: Delicious Murmur
description: "The day has eyes..."

name: Departure from Failure
description: "Life is made up of success and failure and more failure."

name: Conditional Help
description: "Sure, sure I can help, as long as you pay up."

name: Flutter of a Fledgling's Wings
description: "You work hard so that you will have no regrets."

name: Priceless Sincerity
description: "When it comes to memories, T-Dolls and humans are all the same."

name: A Witch's Night
description: "Listen. Listen to the music drifting through the night sky..."

name: Dazzling Future
description: "Think of it as your tuition fees. I'm saying this in advance, okay?"

name: Interlude of Dreams
description: Beautiful things need to be described. Give it a name.

name: Dealer
description: "After a long day at work, Lee Enfield returns to her peaceful sanctuary, but something unexpected happens..."

name: Player
description: "Lee Enfield never thought she'd ever find herself in such a group, around people even stranger than herself..."

name: Bet
description: "Things are never as simple as people make them out to be... Lee knows this very well, but she doesn't want to lose."

name: Call
description: "The world is a wonderful place, especially when you think you're better than someone else."

name: Odds
description: "'Accept your failure gracefully, learn your lesson, and make it a stepping stone for your success.' Anyone could say such pretty words, but she would never fail to begin with."

name: Deal
description: "All actors are in position. Curtains up."

name: Goddess of Luck
description: "Nothing is unbeatable. I believe firmly in that, and it's the reason why I've never lost."

name: Blind
description: "The mouse that has but one hole is quickly taken."

name: 1v1
description: "When you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss gazes also into you."

name: Fold
description: "Life isn't a story, but perhaps everyone is a protagonist in the story called life."

name: Orion
description:
Alpha Ursae Majoris has never been so clear.
 I always lament the fact that I'm not a Doll that specializes in astronomy.
 But I believe there are secrets hidden within a planet's spectrum.
 It will surely lead us out of our current predicament.

name: Specular Reflection
description:
The boundless wasteland stretches on and on, yet we still can't find a spot where we can glimpse the Orion constellation.
 The only embellishment on these moors are speckles of lackluster stars shining dimly.
 As their attention strays to this light, the story once again spirals out of control.

name: Orion's Belt
description:
The journey home stretches on and the constellations guide our way.
 Yet PzB39 stalls and tarries...

name: Hesitation
description: Noticing PzB39's hesitation, M590 makes up her mind to do something...

name: Microgravity
description:
When you fall, you're practically in a state of weightlessness.
 It's a completely different sensation from riding a motorbike against the wind.
 One has no choice but to hold on tight.

name: Intuition
description: PzB39 and M590 begin to visualize their escape, while Grizzly hasn't given up hope on finding them.

name: Stargazer
description: Grizzly decides to act on her intuition. Meanwhile, M590 and PzB39 are driven to their wit's end.

name: Morning Star
description: After running into wall after wall, the team once again strays off the right path...

name: Extraterrestrial Civilization
description: A solution to the ultimate problem emerges in the endless odyssey.

name: Seafarer
description:
The Griffin HQ is brimming with jubilation.
 The Dolls surround the race tracks and revel in the rumbling of motorbike engines.

name: Rosemary
description: "Those two are the pride of Griffin's Logistics Department. Those who are greedy would wonder - wouldn't it be amazing if they became one?!"

name: Black Pepper
description: "Only unexpected incidents can break the daily routine and bring about new change."

name: Berry Jam
description: "A single spark can start a prairie fire, all it takes is a gust that blows in the right direction."

name: Salt & Sugar
description: "Some things don't always go according to expectation. Mixing delicious seasonings will create weird flavors."

name: Warm Milk
description: "Springfield is always understanding."

name: Iced Coffee
description: "Gr G36 is always meticulous."

name: Protein Excess
description: "Sometimes TOO understanding."

name: Caffeine Addiction
description: "Sometimes TOO meticulous."

name: Seasoning
description: "Have you tried putting salt on watermelon?"

name: Salted Watermelon
description: "It makes it doubly delicious."
